title.value: Biological and economic efficiency of herbicide tank mixtures against annual dicotyledonous weeds in oil flax crops
Биологическая и экономическая эффективность баковых смесей гербицидов против однолетних двудольных сорняков в посевах льна масличного

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Evseev, P.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute of Flax

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented the four-year results of field experiments on the efficacy of herbicides mixtures against annual dicotyledonous weeds in oil flax (Linum usitatissimum). In 2008 into the

for use on flax-fiber flax there were added preparations on the basis of sulfonylurea derivatives: akkurat, WDG (metsulfuron-methyl, 600 g / kg) and the picador, WDG (prosulfuron, 750 g / kg). In this regard, we conducted field experiments to study the effectiveness of these drugs in linseed crops. It is established that the contamination of weed species with a predominance of Chenopodium album to use herbicides mixes: picador, WDG (15 g/he) + 2M-4X 750, w.s. (0,5 l/he); akkurat, WDG (6 g/he) + 2M-4X 750, w.s. (0,5 l/he) - the biological efficacy against dicotyledonous weed species reaches 94,1%. The herbicides mixes of the picador, WDG (15 g/he) or akkurat, WDG (6 g/he) exactly with 2M-4X 750, w.s. (0,5 l/he) on the efficiency do not concede to mixes of herbicides the secator turbo, OD (50 ml/he) or charmoni DFS (10 g/he) with 2M-4X 750, w.s. (0,5 l/he).
